dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S1148 IS: To terminate the Department of Education.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Paul (for himself, Mr. Lee, and Mr. Moreno) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To terminate the Department of Education.

section.header: Termination of the Department of Education
section.text: The Department of Education shall terminate on December 31, 2026.
